title: How to Make an Apple Pie Smoothie

methods.name: Making An Apple Pie Smoothie With Oats

steps.headline: Prepare the apple.
steps.description: Wash one large apple and remove the core. You don't need to peel the apple, although you may want to if your blender isn't very powerful. Chop the apple into rough pieces and put them in the blender. Consider using a Red Delicious of Gala apple for the best flavor in this smoothie.

steps.headline: Blend the smoothie ingredients.
steps.description: Add the remaining smoothie ingredients into the blender. Just be sure to pour the almond milk in first so it's nearest to the blender blade. Blitz the ingredients until they're smooth. Add all ingredients except for ice.

steps.headline: Add ice and finish blending the smoothie.
steps.description: Dump in 1 cup (140 g) of ice cubes and cover the blender with the lid. Turn the blender on and blitz the smoothie again until it's completely smooth. Pour the smoothie into two glasses and serve them immediately. You can garnish the apple pie smoothies with a dusting of cinnamon or a sliver of apple.

methods.name: Making a Vegan Apple Pie Smoothie

steps.headline: Prepare the apples.
steps.description: Wash two large red apple and remove the cores. You don't need to peel the apples, although you may want to if your blender isn't very powerful. Chop the apple into rough pieces and put them in the blender. Consider using Fuji apples for the best flavor in this smoothie.

steps.headline: Blend the smoothie ingredients.
steps.description: Add the remaining smoothie ingredients into the blender. Pour the almond milk and Greek yogurt in first so they're nearest to the blender blade. Blend the ingredients until they're smooth. Add in all ingredients except for ice and sweetener (if using).

steps.headline: Add ice and sweetener, as needed.
steps.description: Add 1 cup (140 g) of ice to the blender and blitz the smoothie until the ice is completely blended. Remove the lid and taste the smoothie. If you'd like to make it sweeter, consider adding 1 or 2 pitted dates or 1 to 2 teaspoons of honey. Pulse the blender to incorporate the sweetener. This smoothie makes enough for two drinks, so divide it between two glasses when you're ready to serve them.

methods.name: Making a Warm Apple Pie Smoothie

steps.headline: Prepare the apple.
steps.description: Wash one large apple and remove the core. You don't need to peel the apple, although you may want to if your blender isn't very powerful. Chop the apple into chunks and put the chunks in the blender. You can use any type of apple that you enjoy eating. For example, you could use Pink Lady apples, Gala apples, or Jonagolds.

steps.headline: Blend the remaining ingredients.
steps.description: Add the remaining smoothie ingredients into the blender. Pour the water in first so it's nearest to the blender blade. Blend the ingredients until they're smooth. Use all remaining ingredients.

steps.headline: Microwave the apple pie smoothie.
steps.description:
Pour the smoothie into a large microwave-safe mug. Microwave the smoothie on the high setting for about two minutes. Carefully remove the warm smoothie from the microwave and garnish the smoothie. Consider topping the warm apple pie smoothie with:
Whipped cream
Cinnamon sticks
Ice cream
Sprinkled cinnamon
